comment: This theorem, called "Assertion", can be thought of as closed form of modus ponens ~ ax-mp . Theorem *2.27 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 104. Copy of ~ pm2.27 with a different proof. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 17-Dec-2018.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
